Name: Curiosity
Description: A basic motivation from the depths of consciousness. The desire for something new.

Name: Determination
Description: A basic motivation from the depths of consciousness. The manifestation of will to take action.

Name: Aggression
Description: A basic motivation from the depths of consciousness. The urge for destruction and self-destruction.

Name: Concentration
Description: A basic motivation from the depths of consciousness. Focusing on an object or subject.

Name: Inspiration
Description: A basic motivation from the depths of consciousness. The desire to create and bring beauty to the world.

Name: Loneliness
Description: A basic motivation. The desire for communication and exchange of experiences.

Name: Open
Description: What's inside?

Name: Meet
Description: I must meet new people, otherwise madness and isolation will drive me crazy.

Name: Inspect
Description: I must take a closer look at this.

Name: Use
Description: Practically all things have their default purpose.

Name: Overcome
Description: The lack of a direct path to my goal won't stop me.

Name: Agree
Description: I'll take on this task.

Name: Decline
Description: I'm not interested in this.

Name: Hit
Description: This must be destroyed.

Name: Threaten
Description: I will get what I want from you.

Name: Kick
Description: This should not be in my space.

Name: Read
Description: Written works will help me understand the situation.

Name: Hack
Description: If something is locked, it must contain something valuable.

Name: Go
Description: There should be another road here.

Name: Recover
Description: Minor damage on objects and light injuries on people.

Name: Create
Description: Being creative allows me to distract from criminal affairs.

Name: Contemplate
Description: It's worth stopping here. Serenity may reveal something unexpected to me.

Name: Write
Description: Writing helps me structure information.

Name: Talk
Description: I need details about what's happening.

Name: Approach
Description: I want to communicate more often with interesting people.

Name: Pay
Description: I can pay for something or trade.

Name: Pay with a valuable item
Description: I can trade special items with those who are interested in the Other Side.

Name: Investigate
Description: I see something suspicious, maybe it's worth digging deeper.

Name: Feel
Description: I see emotions. They surround me and other people with a rainbow aura.

Name: Poison
Description: This poison is deadly. You need to be careful.

Name: Heal
Description: In my hands is the power of restoration. It will strengthen me and drive away disease.

Name: Inspect
Description: Sometimes it's useful to examine the surroundings and objects, detailing the overall picture.

Name: Open
Description: A basic action, available to every sentient being in the universe. The journey begins with a Door.

Name: Focus
Description: By choosing a target, I can understand how to interact with it better.

Name: Communicate
Description: Words open doors that keys cannot.

Name: Find
Description: Hidden forces will help me find what's concealed. I just need to tune the aspect of the image.

Name: Dig
Description: If the land is pliable enough, I might find something.

Name: Close Case No. 1
Description: Mrs. Bates' cat will never return. But who intentionally buried it after killing?

Name: Tidy Up
Description: The room gets cluttered quickly, so it's important to spend some time tidying up.

Name: Create Phantom
Description: Based on the image, I can create a short-lived illusion.

Name: Close Case No. 1
Description: Deceive the woman into believing her cat has been found.
